articles.title: Holi 2025: India comes alive with the festival of colours - BBC.com
articles.description: The festival, celebrated in India and abroad, commemorates the victory of good over evil.
articles.content:
Millions of Indians are celebrating Holi, the festival of colours.
The spring festival symbolises the victory of good over evil and marks the end of winter.
People light a bonfire, smear or spray f… [+529 chars]
